definitions.definition: liked more than others of the same kind

examples.text: It's one of my favourite movies.
January is my least favourite month.

definitions.definition: a performer, politician, sports player, etc., who is popular where they were born
(in the US) a candidate for president who is supported by his or her own state in the first part of a campaign

wordOrigin: late 16th cent. (as a noun): from obsolete French favorit, from Italian favorito, past participle of favorire ‘to favour’, from Latin favor, from favere ‘show kindness to’ (related to fovere ‘cherish’).
